title: Auto-invoking functions
content: Today I learned that two parentheses after a function, without any further arguments, auto-invokes the function. The more you know!

title: A Real Conundrum
content: What do you call a drum shared by two nuns?

title: Model-View-Controller
content: So I guess MVC comes from a programming template that means Model-View-Controller, and NOT a term from Bitcoin that means Making Valuable Crypto...
